Text: i see 2 different games on the screenshots u posted..big game hunter 2012 and thehunter..so im confused..is this really is thehunter..can u play in all areas or just loggers point island?
Just the first island no other areas

This game can you get here for free

http://www.thehunter.com/pub/
Pictures you have posted is from Cabela's Big Game Hunter 2012
How can you be a trusted uploader when you upload such things? This is a HI2U release, yet you change the name and claim that it has the features that it doesn't.
